description: Number of nonisomorphic solutions to minimal dominating set on queens' graph Q(n).
references: W. W. R. Ball and H. S. M. Coxeter,"Math'l Rec. and Essays," 13th Ed. Dover, p. 173.
Matthew D. Kearse and Peter B. Gibbons, "Computational Methods and New Results for Chessboard Problems", Australasian Journal of Combinatorics 23 (2001), 253-284.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: M. A. Sainte-Laguë, Les Réseaux (ou Graphes), Mémorial des Sciences Mathématiques, Fasc. 18, Gauthier-Villars, Paris, 1923, 64 pages. See p. 49.

author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
